feed.title: Innovative Surgical Sciences
feed.subtitle: A RSS feed containing the latest articles published in Innovative Surgical Sciences

entry.title: Surgical systematic reviews: best available evidence or disposable waste?

entry.title: Impact of different parameters on the outcome of vv-ECMO therapy in burn patients – a retrospective cohort study from a burn and high output ECMO center

entry.title: Trastuzumab holds potential to accelerate spontaneous sensory reinnervation after free flap breast reconstruction: a proof of concept
